#summary Instructions for setting up Eclipse/SVN environment
= Instructions for setting up eclipse/svn environment =

= Following steps run under Ubuntu 12.04: =

 # Install eclipse, under "Ubuntu Software Center". * (skip this step if eclipse already installed) *
 # Within Eclispe:
   ## Help/Install New Software/Add:
     Name: SVN ..
     Location: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.8.x
   ## select both "Subclipse" and SVNKit" and follow instructions to install, then allow to reboot eclipse
   ## After eclipse restarts:
      File/New Project/Checkout Projects from SVN
   ## Create New Repository, and enter:
       https://all-eyes.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ * (for ae-daemon/ae-proxy) *
         or 
       https://all-eyes.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/armgr/aeManager * (for aeManager)*

   After hitting next, the source tree should display.

    (NOTE: User should also install CDT to allow for easy editing of "c" programs.)
